name: Buffalo Chicken Thighs with Celery and Blue Cheese Salad
description: This recipe marries the spicy heat of Buffalo chicken with cool, creamy blue cheese. A match made in pub heaven!

ingredients.name: bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs (approx. 3 lbs/1.5 kg)

preparation: Whisk together 1 tbsp seasoning, ketchup, brown sugar and vinegar. Set aside.
Sprinkle chicken thighs with remaining seasoning, coating well. Place on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Cook for 25 min.
While chicken is cooking, whisk sour cream, mayonnaise, dip mix, and vinegar together in a mixing bowl.
Place lettuce and celery pieces on top of dressing. Set aside.
When chicken is cooked, toss in Buffalo sauce and transfer to a serving platter.
Toss salad and sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese.
